question: You have just moved into a new home and are planning to hold a party. You are worried that the noise may disturb your neighbour.Write a letter to your neighbour. In your letterintroduce yourselfdescribe your plans for the partyinvite your neighbour to come
text: Good day, dear Mr and Mrs Smith.
Let me introduce myself, my name I Alexey and I am a new tenant of the apartment of 3C and that means I am your new neighbor.

As you may know, I have just moved to the flat last week and what to celebrate my housewarming party the next Saturday. My party will start at 11 AM and hold I think about three or maybe four hours, we will try to be not so noisy but do not judge our very strong if sometimes we will be a little loud.

Also, I would like to invite you and your wife to my event it let us know each other much more. I will be very appreciative if you give me your decision about coming not late than Wednesday evening because I need time for ordering a meal and drinks according to my quantity of visitors.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
